task.title: Select Nodes Manually
task.shortdesc: Select nodes directly in the Graph with the following steps.

copyright.copyrholder: Use of this public-domain resource is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License

step.cmd: In the graph, click node once to Select.
step.info: The node will turn Bold, indicated that it has been Selected.

step.cmd: Click a second time to Deselect.
step.info: The node's appearance will change back to normal, indicating that is in a Deselected state.
